name: Dewgong
flavorText:
Stores thermal
energy in its
body. Swims at a steady 8 knots
even in intensely
cold waters.

previous.name: Seel
previous.flavorText:
The protruding
horn on its head
is very hard. It is used for
bashing through
thick ice.

next.name: Grimer
next.flavorText:
Appears in filthy
areas. Thrives by
sucking up polluted sludge
that is pumped
out of factories.
